comment.text: The "Auto sync" translation key is used to display a label for an option that enables automatic synchronization of LDAP data. It appears as a toggle switch in the PortalSettings categories integration settings, indicating the availability and control of this feature.

usage.context:
fontWeight={600}
 lineHeight="20px"
 noSelect
 className="settings_unavailable"
 >
 {t("LdapAutoSyncToggle")}
 </Text>
 {!isLdapAvailable ? (
 <Badge
 backgroundColor={
 theme.isBase

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses 'սինխրոնիզացիա' which is a transliteration and not a fully accepted Armenian word. While understandable, it lacks native flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ավտոմատ համապատասխանեցում (Avtomat hamapatasxanut) - 'Automatic synchronization' is a more natural translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ອັດຕະໂນມັດຊິງໂຄນ' is a literal transcription of 'auto sync' and doesn't convey the meaning naturally in Lao. It's a clunky and unnatural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural Lao equivalent like 'ຊິງຂໍ້ມູນອັດຕະໂນມັດ' (sing khomun attanomat) or 'ອັບເດດຂໍ້ມູນອັດຕະໂນມັດ' (update khomun attanomat) which means 'automatic data sync' or 'automatic data update', respectively.  The best choice depends on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ස්වයංක්‍රීය සමමුහුර්තකරණය' is a very literal and lengthy translation of 'Auto sync'. It's overly formal and doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala. A more natural translation would be something like 'සුදුහු කිරීම්' (sudu humik) or ' automatisch synchronization'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'සුදුහු කිරීම්' (sudu humik) or ' automatisch synchronization' for a more natural and concise translation.  Alternatively, 'ඔටෝමැටික් සංමුඛ කිරීම්' (otomathik sanmukhak karak) is also a viable option, using the loan word 'otomathik'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Аутоматско синхронизовање' is spelled correctly.
While technically correct, 'Аутоматско синхронизовање' is a more literal translation of 'Auto sync'. A more natural and concise translation for UI might be 'Авто синхронизација'.

While "Automatsko sinhronizovanje" is a literal translation, "Auto sinhronizacija" would be more natural and commonly used in Serbian (Latin). "Sinhronizacija" is the standard term for 'synchronization'.
